```{r}
library(tess3r)

```


# Perte de precision quand on bruite les coordonn√©es
```{r}
exp <- long_tess3_noisyCoord(n = 200,
                             cluster.nb = NULL,
                             nb.rep = 5,
                             noise.signal = c(0.0, 1.0, 3.0),
                             save = FALSE, bypass = TRUE)
plot_tess3_noisyCoord(exp)
```

# Le garde fou : le variogram

```{r}
exp <- long_tess3_noisyCoord(n = 200,
                             cluster.nb = NULL,
                             nb.rep = 1,
                             noise.signal = c(0.0, 1.0, 3.0),
                             compute.vario = TRUE,
                             save = FALSE, bypass = TRUE)
plot_tess3_noisyCoord(exp)
```
